  "title": "Content Creator / Digital Marketer",
  "description": "Prixair Group is a diversified Nigerian conglomerate founded in 2011 by entrepreneur Demola Banjo. Headquartered in Abuja, the group operates across multiple sectors, including real estate development and investment, property management, hotel operations, catering services, media services, and bottled water production.

Prixair Group, our vision is to be a leading conglomerate that delivers exceptional products and services across various industries, contributing significantly to Nigeria&rsquo;s economic growth and setting benchmarks for excellence and innovation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Digital Marketer&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking a creative and strategic Content Creator/Digital Marketer to strengthen the Prixair Group brand presence across all subsidiaries.
	The ideal candidate will develop engaging content, manage digital campaigns, and drive online engagement to increase visibility, customer acquisition, and revenue growth.


Key Responsibilities
Content Creation &amp; Strategy:


	Develop and execute multimedia content (text, images, videos, graphics) tailored for each subsidiary.
	Craft compelling stories to communicate brand values, services, and customer experiences.
	Maintain content calendars for websites, social media, blogs, and newsletters.


Digital Marketing &amp; Campaign Management:


	Plan and implement digital marketing campaigns across platforms (Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, X).
	Run targeted ads to generate leads and increase conversions.
	Monitor and optimize SEO and SEM strategies for visibility and ranking.


Social Media Management:


	Grow, engage, and manage the community on all social media platforms.
	Track performance metrics and provide reports on engagement, reach, and ROI.
	Respond to followers, feedback, and online inquiries in a timely and professional manner.


Branding &amp; Corporate Communications:


	Align digital content with Prixair Group&rsquo;s brand identity and vision.
	Support subsidiaries with digital campaigns for product launches, promotions, and events.
	Work closely with HR for employer branding initiatives.


Analytics &amp; Reporting:


	Use digital analytics tools (Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, etc.) to measure campaign success.
	Provide regular insights to management for strategic decision-making.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Growth in social media followers, engagement, and brand mentions.
	Increase in website traffic and online conversions.
	Lead generation and successful campaign ROI.
	Consistency in content calendar execution.
	Positive brand visibility across digital platforms.


Qualifications &amp; Skills


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, Digital Media, or related fields
	Proven experience (3&ndash;5 years) as a Content Creator, Digital Marketer, or Social Media Manager.
	Strong knowledge of SEO, SEM, Google Analytics, and social media algorithms.
	Proficiency in creative tools (Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator, Premier Pro, After Effects, etc.).
	Excellent writing, communication, and storytelling skills.
	Ability to multitask across different brands and industries.
	Innovative thinker with strong problem-solving skills.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary (N100,000 - N130,000 monthly) and benefits package.
	Opportunity to work across diverse industries.
	A dynamic, innovative, and growth-driven work environment.
	Professional development and training opportunities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hrprixairgroup@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Content Creator / Digital Marketer Job at Prixair Group




        
    

        
        Prixair Group is a diversified Nigerian conglomerate founded in 2011 by entrepreneur Demola Banjo. Headquartered in Abuja, the group operates across multiple sectors, including real estate development and investment, property management, hotel operations, catering services, media services, and bottled water production.

Prixair Group, our vision is to be a leading conglomerate that delivers exceptional products and services across various industries, contributing significantly to Nigeria’s economic growth and setting benchmarks for excellence and innovation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Digital Marketer 
     

            
    



Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking a creative and strategic Content Creator/Digital Marketer to strengthen the Prixair Group brand presence across all subsidiaries.
	The ideal candidate will develop engaging content, manage digital campaigns, and drive online engagement to increase visibility, customer acquisition, and revenue growth.


Key Responsibilities
Content Creation & Strategy:


	Develop and execute multimedia content (text, images, videos, graphics) tailored for each subsidiary.
	Craft compelling stories to communicate brand values, services, and customer experiences.
	Maintain content calendars for websites, social media, blogs, and newsletters.


Digital Marketing & Campaign Management:


	Plan and implement digital marketing campaigns across platforms (Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, X).
	Run targeted ads to generate leads and increase conversions.
	Monitor and optimize SEO and SEM strategies for visibility and ranking.


Social Media Management:


	Grow, engage, and manage the community on all social media platforms.
	Track performance metrics and provide reports on engagement, reach, and ROI.
	Respond to followers, feedback, and online inquiries in a timely and professional manner.


Branding & Corporate Communications:


	Align digital content with Prixair Group’s brand identity and vision.
	Support subsidiaries with digital campaigns for product launches, promotions, and events.
	Work closely with HR for employer branding initiatives.


Analytics & Reporting:


	Use digital analytics tools (Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, etc.) to measure campaign success.
	Provide regular insights to management for strategic decision-making.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Growth in social media followers, engagement, and brand mentions.
	Increase in website traffic and online conversions.
	Lead generation and successful campaign ROI.
	Consistency in content calendar execution.
	Positive brand visibility across digital platforms.


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, Digital Media, or related fields
	Proven experience (3–5 years) as a Content Creator, Digital Marketer, or Social Media Manager.
	Strong knowledge of SEO, SEM, Google Analytics, and social media algorithms.
	Proficiency in creative tools (Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator, Premier Pro, After Effects, etc.).
	Excellent writing, communication, and storytelling skills.
	Ability to multitask across different brands and industries.
	Innovative thinker with strong problem-solving skills.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary (N100,000 - N130,000 monthly) and benefits package.
	Opportunity to work across diverse industries.
	A dynamic, innovative, and growth-driven work environment.
	Professional development and training opportunities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrprixairgroup@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
